title: 253.22 PRISONER ALLOWANCES.
text:
When any prisoner is discharged from the Minnesota Security Hospital, the prisoner must receive the same allowances in money, clothing, and otherwise that the prisoner would have received on remaining at the correctional facility the prisoner came from, and the expenditures on behalf of the prisoner must be made out of the same fund.
While at the hospital, the prisoner must be clothed and supported as are other patients at the facility.
